content.rendered:
Directed by Gopi Puthran

Written by Gopi Puthran

Cast Rani Mukerji (Shivani Shivaji Roy). Sunny Hinduja (Viplav Beniwal). Shruti Bapna (Inspector Bharti Angare). Avneet Kaur (Meera). Rajesh Sharma (Amit Kumar). Garima Jain (Reporter 1). Richa Meena (Sunanda). Pariva Pranati (Aabha Parihar). Jisshu Sengupta (Vikram Roy (as Jishu Sengupta)). Vishal Jethwa (Shiv ‘Sunny’ Prasad Yadav). Vikram Singh Chauhan (Inspector Anup Singhal). K.C. Shankar (Ig). Akkshay Gunaawat (Policeman Keval (as Akshay Gunawat)). Prasanna Ketkar (Panditji). Virti Vaghani (Priyanka). Kirti Choudhary (Reporters 5). Komal Chhabria (Koyal’s Mother). Deepika Amin (Dr. Harni Kapur). Dino James (Shooter). Ravi Kothari (Sp Vijay). Girish Sharma (Kunwar). Amit Thakur (Koyal’s Father). Shilpa Iyer (Doctor). Aanchal Sahu (Brij’s Daughter). Tejasvi Singh Ahlawat (Latika). Sumit Nijhawan (DSP Brij Shekhawat). Anurag Sharma (Kamal Parihar). Sukesh Anand (Raawat). Hemant Soni (Hawaldaar Jhaakar). Leena Balodi (Latika’s Mother). Yuvradnyee (News Channel Crew (as Aishwarya Rajesh Ash)). Ambrish Saxena (Latika’s Father (as Ambarish Kumar Saxena)). Mahendra Shrivas (Lavanya’s Father). Manika Mehrotra (Koyal). RoksolanaHasekiHÃ¼rrem (Rape Victim (credit only)). Amol Deshmukh (Naman Kedia). Prabhjeet Kaur (Jyoti). Sunita Hooda (Latika’s Principal). Vishal Nath (Pravin). Mukesh Agrohari (Shivani’S Gunman). Aditi Patil (Labourer Women). Pratyaksh Rajbhatt (Monty). Mohammad Nayem (Mohammad Nayem). Vishal Sudarshanwar (Vinay). Sweta Paswan (Reporters 3). Kajal Sharma (News Channel Crew). Chandra Prakash Soni (Reporters 4). Ashish Tyagi (Worked as a dialect coach). Aanchal Srivastava (Tina). Santosh Sonawane (Policemen 3). Vasu Soni (Reporters 2). Nilrajsinh Rathod (Mahesh). Tanmayee Umrikar (Latika’s Friend). Noor Mohammed Solanki (Temple Watchman). Sagar Thathera (Policemen 1). Rajat Shukla (Reporter Hemchand). Arjun Vinod Pasan (Lahanaya). Azhar Shaikh Ahmed (Policemen 2). Kishor Bachhav (Bhanwar). Agasthya. Shanker (Minister Bhardwaj). Swapnil Sharma (Birju). Amit Rai (Cctv Operator). Kailash Kumar (Kumar Illustrator). Najma Sultana (Muslim Woman). Pallavi Jadhao (Lahanya’s Mother)

Languages Hindi

Producers Aditya Chopra. Tanvi Gandhi. Bharat Rawail. Rajat Kanti Sarkar. Ajay Sharma

Production Yash Raj Film
